meanings.definition: A type of tropical hardwood tree.
meanings.sent1: The cocobolos in the forest provide shade and shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The explorer marveled at the tall cocobolos swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey used the cocobolos as a hiding spot during the game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The cocobolos stood strong like ancient guardians of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the cocobolos rustled softly in the wind.

meanings.definition: The hard, reddish-brown wood of the cocobolo tree.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carved intricate designs into the cocobolos to create beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The cabinet was made from polished cocobolos, adding a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The musician tapped the cocobolos lightly, producing a melodic sound that enchanted the audience.
meanings.sent4: The cocobolos gleamed in the sunlight, revealing its rich, reddish-brown hues.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of cocobolos filled the workshop as the carpenter worked on the new table.

meanings.definition: A type of wood used for making furniture and musical instruments.
meanings.sent1: The skilled craftsman selected the finest cocobolos for crafting a grand piano.
meanings.sent2: The luxurious chair was upholstered with soft cushions and cocobolos armrests.
meanings.sent3: The orchestra conductor tapped the cocobolos baton against the music stand to signal the start of the performance.
meanings.sent4: The cocobolos resonated with a deep, rich tone when the musician played the guitar.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the cocobolos table showcased the artisan's talent and attention to detail.
